info.name: Shinigami
info.description: Spiritual warriors who maintain the balance between life and death.
info.author: Cynful Aurora Project

description.p: Shinigami, or Soul Reapers, are spiritual beings who preserve the balance between the living world and the afterlife. They wield Zanpakutō—manifestations of their souls—to guide spirits and combat Hollows.
Each Shinigami possesses unique spiritual energy, known as Reiatsu. This energy fuels their abilities and grants them awareness of the unseen world.

Ability Score Increase.Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age.Shinigami mature at the same rate as humans but can live for centuries due to their spiritual nature.
Alignment.Most Shinigami tend toward lawful alignments, valuing duty and structure.
Size.Shinigami are similar in build to humans. Your size is Medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Languages.You can speak, read, and write Common and Spiritual Tongue.

Spiritual Awareness.You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to detect ethereal or undead creatures.
Reiatsu Control.Once per long rest, as a bonus action, you can empower your attacks with spiritual energy. For 1 minute, you add your proficiency bonus to attack and damage rolls.
Soul Form.As an action, you can separate from your physical body (if applicable), entering a spirit state for up to 10 minutes. You can pass through non-magical barriers and see into the Ethereal Plane, but you cannot interact with solid matter. Once per long rest.
Zanpakutō Affinity.You gain proficiency with longswords, treating one as your Zanpakutō. You may use Wisdom instead of Strength or Dexterity for attack and damage rolls when wielding it.
You can perceive spirits and invisible entities. You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to detect ethereal or undead creatures.
